parameters.name: autoconvert
parameters.description: ontuse replacement settings from accounts API Auto Replace settings page fulltall non GSM 03.38 characters will be replaced with suitable alternatives. offtmessage content is not modified in any way.

parameters.name: charset
parameters.description: Encoding of the text and from parameter value. Defaults to UTF-8

parameters.name: dlr-url
parameters.description: URL where automatic Delivery Request is made.

parameters.name: from
parameters.description: Optional parameter that sets Sender. When not set, default Sender is used. Sender must be encoded in UTF-8

parameters.name: password
parameters.description: API account security key (API key) from the Messentes web page

parameters.name: text
parameters.description: All characters (Unicode) and long messages are supported

parameters.name: time_to_send
parameters.description: Optional parameter for sending message at some specific time in the future. Must be numeric Unix timestamp i.e. 1415253378. If time_to_send is set in past, message will be sent with no delays.

parameters.name: to
parameters.description: Receivers phone number with country code

parameters.name: username
parameters.description: API account user name from the Messentes web page
